å±æ€§åŠ¨ç”»

lua
--[[
ObjectAnimator(å¯¹è±¡åŠ¨ç”»)
--å±æ€§åŠ¨ç”»æ¦‚å¿µï¼š
æ‰€è°“å±æ€§åŠ¨ç”»ï¼š
æ”¹å˜ä¸€åˆ‡èƒ½æ”¹å˜çš„å¯¹è±¡çš„å±æ€§å€¼ï¼Œä¸åŒäºè¡¥é—´åŠ¨ç”»
åªèƒ½æ”¹å˜ alphaï¼Œscaleï¼Œrotateï¼Œtranslate
å¬ç€æœ‰ç‚¹æŠ½è±¡ï¼Œä¸¾ä¾‹å­è¯´æ˜ã€‚
]]

--è¡¥é—´åŠ¨ç”»èƒ½å®ç°çš„:
--1.alpha(é€æ˜)
--ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¸º viewå¯¹è±¡,ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¸º åŠ¨ç”»æ”¹å˜çš„ç±»å‹,ç¬¬ä¸‰,ç¬¬å››ä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¾æ¬¡æ˜¯å¼€å§‹é€æ˜åº¦å’Œç»“æŸé€æ˜åº¦ã€‚
alpha = ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(text, "alpha", 0, 1)
alpha.setDuration(2000)--è®¾ç½®åŠ¨ç”»æ—¶é—´
alpha.setInterpolator(DecelerateInterpolator())--è®¾ç½®åŠ¨ç”»æ’å…¥å™¨ï¼Œå‡é€Ÿ
alpha.setRepeatCount(-1)--è®¾ç½®åŠ¨ç”»é‡å¤æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œ-1ä»£è¡¨æ— é™
alpha.setRepeatMode(Animation.REVERSE)--è®¾ç½®åŠ¨ç”»å¾ªç¯æ¨¡å¼ã€‚
alpha.start()--å¯åŠ¨åŠ¨ç”»ã€‚

--2.scale(ç¼©æ”¾)
animatorSet = AnimatorSet()--ç»„åˆåŠ¨ç”»
scaleX = ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(text, "scaleX", 1, 0)
scaleY = ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(text, "scaleY", 1, 0)
animatorSet.setDuration(2000)
animatorSet.setInterpolator(DecelerateInterpolator());
animatorSet.play(scaleX).with(scaleY)--ä¸¤ä¸ªåŠ¨ç”»åŒæ—¶å¼€å§‹
animatorSet.start();




--3.translate(å¹³ç§»)
translationUp = ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(button, "Y",button.getY(), 0)
translationUp.setInterpolator(DecelerateInterpolator())
translationUp.setDuration(1500)
translationUp.start()




--4. rotate(æ—‹è½¬)
set = AnimatorSet()
anim = ObjectAnimator .ofFloat(phone, "rotationX", 0, 180)
anim.setDuration(2000)
anim2 = ObjectAnimator .ofFloat(phone, "rotationX", 180, 0)
anim2.setDuration(2000)
anim3 = ObjectAnimator .ofFloat(phone, "rotationY", 0, 180)
anim3.setDuration(2000)
anim4 = ObjectAnimator .ofFloat(phone, "rotationY", 180, 0)
anim4.setDuration(2000)
set.play(anim).before(anim2)--å…ˆæ‰§è¡ŒanimåŠ¨ç”»ä¹‹ååœ¨æ‰§è¡Œanim2
set.play(anim3).before(anim4)
set.start()



--è¡¥é—´åŠ¨ç”»ä¸èƒ½å®ç°çš„:
--5.android æ”¹å˜èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²çš„åŠ¨ç”»å®ç°å¦‚ä¸‹

translationUp = ObjectAnimator.ofInt(button,"backgroundColor",{Color.RED, Color.BLUE, Color.GRAY,Color.GREEN})
translationUp.setInterpolator(DecelerateInterpolator())
translationUp.setDuration(1500)
translationUp.setRepeatCount(-1)
translationUp.setRepeatMode(Animation.REVERSE)
translationUp.setEvaluator(ArgbEvaluator())
translationUp.start()
--[[
ArgbEvaluatorï¼šè¿™ç§è¯„ä¼°è€…å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥æ‰§è¡Œç±»å‹ä¹‹é—´çš„æ’å€¼æ•´æ•°å€¼ä»£è¡¨ARGBé¢œè‰²ã€‚
FloatEvaluatorï¼šè¿™ç§è¯„ä¼°è€…å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥æ‰§è¡Œæµ®ç‚¹å€¼ä¹‹é—´çš„æ’å€¼ã€‚
IntEvaluatorï¼šè¿™ç§è¯„ä¼°è€…å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥æ‰§è¡Œç±»å‹intå€¼ä¹‹é—´çš„æ’å€¼ã€‚
RectEvaluatorï¼šè¿™ç§è¯„ä¼°è€…å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥æ‰§è¡Œç±»å‹ä¹‹é—´çš„æ’å€¼çŸ©å½¢å€¼ã€‚

ç”±äºæœ¬ä¾‹æ˜¯æ”¹å˜Viewçš„backgroundColorå±æ€§çš„èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²æ‰€ä»¥æ­¤å¤„ä½¿ç”¨ArgbEvaluator
]]

--LayoutAnimationControllerå¯ä»¥æ§åˆ¶ä¸€ç»„æ§ä»¶æŒ‰ç…§è§„å®šæ˜¾ç¤º
--å¯¼å…¥ç±»
import "android.view.animation.AnimationUtils"
import "android.view.animation.LayoutAnimationController"



--åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªAnimationå¯¹è±¡
animation = AnimationUtils.loadAnimation(activity,android.R.anim.slide_in_left)



--å¾—åˆ°å¯¹è±¡
lac = LayoutAnimationController(animation)


--è®¾ç½®æ§ä»¶æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„é¡ºåº
lac.setOrder(LayoutAnimationController.ORDER_NORMAL)
--LayoutAnimationController.ORDER_NORMAL   é¡ºåºæ˜¾ç¤º
--LayoutAnimationController.ORDER_REVERSE åæ˜¾ç¤º
--LayoutAnimationController.ORDER_RANDOM éšæœºæ˜¾ç¤º




--è®¾ç½®æ§ä»¶æ˜¾ç¤ºé—´éš”æ—¶é—´
lac.setDelay(time)

--è®¾ç½®ç»„ä»¶åº”ç”¨
view.setLayoutAnimation(lac)

ç‚¹å‡»ç›‘å¬/ç¼©æ”¾åŠ¨ç”»

lua
ç‚¹å‡»ç›‘å¬={
  onTouch=function (v,e)
    if e.action==2 then
      ç¼©æ”¾åŠ¨ç”»(v, 0,0.95,250)
    else
      ç¼©æ”¾åŠ¨ç”»(v,0.95,1,250)
    end
  end}
function ç¼©æ”¾åŠ¨ç”»(view,startscale,endscale,time)
  local animatorSetsuofang = AnimatorSet()
  local scaleX=ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(view,"scaleX",{startscale,endscale})
  local scaleY=ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(view,"scaleY",{startscale,endscale})
  animatorSetsuofang.setDuration(time)
  animatorSetsuofang.setInterpolator(DecelerateInterpolator())
  animatorSetsuofang.play(scaleX).with(scaleY);
  animatorSetsuofang.start()
end

import "android.view.inputmethod.EditorInfo"--å¯¼å…¥æ‰€éœ€ç±»
search_txt.setOnEditorActionListener(TextView.OnEditorActionListener{
  onEditorAction=function(view,actionId,event)
    if (actionId==EditorInfo.IME_ACTION_SEARCH or (event!=null&&event.getKeyCode()== KeyEvent.KEYCODE_ENTER)) then
      if search_txt.text=="" then
        print("æœç´¢å†…å®¹ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º..")
       else
        activity.newActivity("sousuo",{search_txt.text})
        search_txt.text=""
      end
      search_txt.setCursorVisible(false);
      return true
    end
  end})

search_txt.onClick=function()
  search_txt.setCursorVisible(true);
end

function CircleButton(view,InsideColor,radiu)
import "android.graphics.drawable.GradientDrawable"
drawable = GradientDrawable()
drawable.setShape(GradientDrawable.RECTANGLE)
drawable.setColor(InsideColor)
drawable.setCornerRadii({radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu});
view.setBackgroundDrawable(drawable)
end
è§’åº¦=50--åœ†è§’å¼§åº¦

ç¦ç”¨è¿”å›é”®

lua
--ç¦ç”¨è¿”å›æŒ‰é”®
page=0
function onKeyDown(key,event)
  if(key==4)then
    if(webView.canGoBack())then
      webView.goBack()
    else
      page=page+1
      if(page==30)then
        appinfo=this.getPackageManager().getApplicationInfo(this.getPackageName(),0)
        applabel=this.getPackageManager().getApplicationLabel(appinfo)
      end
    end
    return true
  end
end

import "android.content.Intent"
import "android.net.Uri"
url=(webView.getUrl())--Faå½“å‰ç½‘é¡µ

function æ—¶é—´()

åäºŒå°æ—¶åˆ¶=1
asp.setText(os.date("%H:%M:%S"))
if åäºŒå°æ—¶åˆ¶==0 or åäºŒ==0 then
  if tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("24") then
    asp.setText(os.date("00:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("23") then
    asp.setText(os.date("11:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("22") then
    asp.setText(os.date("10:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("21") then
    asp.setText(os.date("9:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("20") then
    asp.setText(os.date("8:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("19") then
    asp.setText(os.date("7:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("18") then
    asp.setText(os.date("6:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("17") then
    asp.setText(os.date("5:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("16") then
    asp.setText(os.date("4:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("15") then
    asp.setText(os.date("3:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("14") then
    asp.setText(os.date("2:%M"))
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("13") then
    asp.setText(os.date("1:%M"))
  end
end

function hb(åäºŒ)
  asp.setText(os.date("%H:%M:%S"))
  --æ£€æµ‹æ—¶é—´å¹¶è®¾ç½®æ—¶é—´æ®µ
  if tonumber(os.date("%H"))>=tonumber("24") then
    asp2.setText("åŠå¤œ")
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))>=tonumber("19") then
    asp2.setText("æ™šä¸Š")
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))>=tonumber("17") then
    asp2.setText("å‚æ™š")
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))>=tonumber("14") then
    asp2.setText("ä¸‹åˆ")
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))>=tonumber("12") then
    asp2.setText("ä¸­åˆ")
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))>=tonumber("10") then
    asp2.setText("ä¸Šåˆ")
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))>=tonumber("7") then
    asp2.setText("æ—©ä¸Š")
   elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))<=tonumber("5") then
    asp2.setText("æ¸…æ™¨")
  end
  if asp.text:find"00" then
    asp.setText(os.date("%H:%M:%S"))
    if åäºŒå°æ—¶åˆ¶==0 or åäºŒ==0 then
      if tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("24") then
        asp.setText(os.date("00:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("23") then
        asp.setText(os.date("11:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("22") then
        asp.setText(os.date("10:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("21") then
        asp.setText(os.date("9:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("20") then
        asp.setText(os.date("8:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("19") then
        asp.setText(os.date("7:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("18") then
        asp.setText(os.date("6:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("17") then
        asp.setText(os.date("5:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("16") then
        asp.setText(os.date("4:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("15") then
        asp.setText(os.date("3:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("14") then
        asp.setText(os.date("2:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("13") then
        asp.setText(os.date("1:%M"))
      end
    end
  end
  if tonumber(os.date("%S"))<03 then
    --print("less than 02")
    if åäºŒå°æ—¶åˆ¶==0 or åäºŒ==0 then
      if tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("24") then
        asp.setText(os.date("00:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("23") then
        asp.setText(os.date("11:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("22") then
        asp.setText(os.date("10:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("21") then
        asp.setText(os.date("9:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("20") then
        asp.setText(os.date("8:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("19") then
        asp.setText(os.date("7:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("18") then
        asp.setText(os.date("6:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("17") then
        asp.setText(os.date("5:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("16") then
        asp.setText(os.date("4:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("15") then

        asp.setText(os.date("2:%M"))
       elseif tonumber(os.date("%H"))==tonumber("13") then
        asp.setText(os.date("1:%M"))
      end
    end
  end
end

import "android.view.inputmethod.EditorInfo"--å¯¼å…¥æ‰€éœ€ç±»
search_txt.setOnEditorActionListener(TextView.OnEditorActionListener{
  onEditorAction=function(view,actionId,event)
    if (actionId==EditorInfo.IME_ACTION_SEARCH or (event!=null&&event.getKeyCode()== KeyEvent.KEYCODE_ENTER)) then
      if search_txt.text=="" then
        print("æœç´¢å†…å®¹ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º..")
      else
        activity.newActivity("sousuo",{search_txt.text})
        search_txt.text=""
      end
      search_txt.setCursorVisible(false);
      return true
    end
  end})

search_txt.onClick=function()
  search_txt.setCursorVisible(true);
end

--ç¨‹åºå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œçš„äº‹ä»¶
toolbar.Visibility=8
function dp2px(dpValue)
  local scale = activity.getResources().getDisplayMetrics().scaledDensity
  return dpValue * scale + 0.5
end
local mheight=activity.getResources().getDimensionPixelSize(luajava.bindClass("com.android.internal.R$dimen")().status_bar_height)
mheight=mheight+dp2px(46)--48å°±æ˜¯æ ‡ç­¾æ é«˜
local linearParams = toolbar.parent.getLayoutParams()
linearParams.height =mheight
toolbar.parent.setLayoutParams(linearParams)

function onKeyDown(code,event)

    if å‚æ•°+2 > tonumber(os.time()) then

--é€€å‡º

function onKeyDown(code,event)
  if string.find(tostring(event),"KEYCODE_BACK") ~= nil then
    if å‚æ•°+2 > tonumber(os.time()) then
      é€€å‡ºç¨‹åº()
     else
      to={
        CardView;
        CardBackgroundColor="#FFffffff";
        elevation="8dp";
        layout_width="95%w";
        layout_height="42dp";
        radius="15";
        id="to";
        {
          TextView;
          textSize="15sp";
          TextColor="#FFa0a0a0";
          layout_width="95%w";
          layout_height="42dp";
          gravity="center";
          text="å‡ºé”™";
          id="texttc";
        };
      }
      local to=Toast.makeText(activity,"å†…å®¹",Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).setView(loadlayout(to))
      --LENGTH_SHORT     2s
      --LENGTH_LONG      3.5s
      to.setGravity(Gravity.BOTTOM,0,60)
      --Gravity.BOTTOM   åº•éƒ¨
      --Gravity.CENTER   ä¸­éƒ¨
      --Gravity.TOP      é¡¶éƒ¨
      texttc.Text=tostring("å†æŒ‰ä¸€æ¬¡é€€å‡ºç¨‹åºï¼")
      to.show()
      å‚æ•°=tonumber(os.time())
    end
    return true
  end
end

é˜²æ­¢æŠ“åŒ…

lua
back=false
thread(function()
  while true do
    require "import"
    import "java.net.NetworkInterface"
    import "java.util.Collections"
    import "java.util.Enumeration"
    import "java.util.Iterator"
    local niList = NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces()
    if niList ~= nil then
      local it = Collections.list(niList).iterator()
      while it.hasNext() do
        local intf = it.next()
        if intf.isUp() and intf.getInterfaceAddresses().size() ~= 0 then
          if String("tun0").equals(intf.getName()) or String("ppp0").equals(intf.getName()) then

            activity.finish()
            back = true
          else
            --print("æœªå¼€å¯VPN")
            back = false
          end
        end
      end
    end
    Thread.sleep(1000)
  end
end)

    xt.setOnCancelListener{
      onCancel=function(l)
        xt.dismiss()
        webView2.stopLoading()
        print("åœæ­¢å—…æ¢")
      end}
  end
end

lua
title={"åˆ†äº«","å¸®åŠ©","çš®è‚¤","é€€å‡º"}
function onCreateOptionsMenu(menu)
  for k,v in ipairs(title) do
    if title[v] then
      local m=menu.addSubMenu(v)
      for k,v in ipairs(title[v]) do
        m.add(v)
      end
    else
      local m=menu.add(v)
      m.setShowAsActionFlags(1)
    end
  end
end
function onMenuItemSelected(id,title)
  if y[title.getTitle()] then
    y[title.getTitle()]()
  end
end

y={}
y["å¸®åŠ©"]=function()
  --äº‹ä»¶
end

--å¯¼å…¥AudioManagerç±»
import "android.content.Context"
import "android.media.AudioManager"


--æ³¨æ„æ˜¯æ”¹å˜åª’ä½“éŸ³é‡
--ä½œè€…messy
--seekbarä¸ºè¿›åº¦æ¡ID


--å¾—åˆ°éŸ³é¢‘ç®¡ç†å¯¹è±¡
mAudioManager = activity.getSystemService(Context.AUDIO_SERVICE);

--è·å–å½“å‰éŸ³ä¹éŸ³é‡
mVolume = mAudioManager.getStreamVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC);

--è®¾ç½®ä¸ºseekbaréŸ³é‡çš„æœ€å¤§é˜¶æ•°
seekbar.setMax(mAudioManager.getStreamMaxVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC));

--è®¾ç½®seekbarä¸ºå½“å‰éŸ³é‡è¿›åº¦
seekbar.setProgress(mVolume);


--ç»‘å®šç›‘å¬
seekbar.setOnSeekBarChangeListener{
  onProgressChanged=function(a,i)
    --æ‹–åŠ¨seekbaræ—¶æ”¹å˜éŸ³é‡
    mAudioManager.setStreamVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC, i, 1);--è®¾ç½®1æ˜¾ç¤ºéŸ³é‡è°ƒèŠ‚çª—å£0ä¸ºéšè—
    px=math.floor(i/mAudioManager.getStreamMaxVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC)*100)
    print("éŸ³é‡:"..px.."%")
  end}

è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢é€‚åº”ä¸»é¢˜

lua
--è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢é€‚åº”ä¸»é¢˜
--è½½å…¥åˆ‡æ¢
--æ ¹æ®Android SDKåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ”¯æŒMDä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä½¿ç”¨Holoä¸»é¢˜
--æ³¨æ„è¦æŠŠä»£ç æ”¾åˆ°activity.setContentView(loadlayout(layout))ä¸Šé¢å»ã€‚

local sdk = Build.VERSION.SDK_INT
if sdk >= 21 then
  theme=... or android.R.style.Theme_Material_Light
else
  theme=... or android.R.style.Theme_Holo_Light
end
activity.setTheme(theme)



--ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®åˆ‡æ¢
æ§ä»¶id.onClick=function(v)
  local sdk = Build.VERSION.SDK_INT
  if sdk >= 21 then
    if theme==android.R.style.Theme_Material then
      activity.finish()
      activity.newActivity("main",android.R.anim.fade_in,android.R.anim.fade_out,{android.R.style.Theme_Material_Light})
    else
      activity.finish()
      activity.newActivity("main",android.R.anim.fade_in,android.R.anim.fade_out,{android.R.style.Theme_Material})
    end
  else
    if theme==android.R.style.Theme_Holo then
      activity.finish()
      activity.newActivity("main",android.R.anim.fade_in,android.R.anim.fade_out,{android.R.style.Theme_Holo_Light})
    else
      activity.finish()
      activity.newActivity("main",android.R.anim.fade_in,android.R.anim.fade_out,{android.R.style.Theme_Holo})
    end
  end
end

  if (keyCode == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BACK && wv.canGoBack())then

    id.goBack()

    return true

  end

  return false

end

è®¾ç½® activity èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²

lua
--è®¾ç½®activityèƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²
function activityèƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²(color)
  _window = activity.getWindow();
  _window.setBackgroundDrawable(ColorDrawable(color));
  _wlp = _window.getAttributes();
  _wlp.gravity = Gravity.BOTTOM;
  _wlp.width = WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT;
  _wlp.height = WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT;--WRAP_CONTENT
  _window.setAttributes(_wlp);
end
--è¯¥å‡½æ•°éœ€è®¾ç½®å¸ƒå±€åä½¿ç”¨

--è°ƒç”¨ä¾‹å­

æ§ä»¶æ³¢çº¹

lua
--æ§ä»¶æ³¢çº¹
import "android.content.res.ColorStateList"
function æ³¢çº¹(id,lx,color)
  xpcall(function()
    ripple = activity.obtainStyledAttributes({android.R.attr.selectableItemBackgroundBorderless}).getResourceId(0,0)
    ripples = activity.obtainStyledAttributes({android.R.attr.selectableItemBackground}).getResourceId(0,0)
    for index,content in ipairs(id) do
      if lx=="åœ†" then
        content.setBackgroundDrawable(activity.Resources.getDrawable(ripple).setColor(ColorStateList(int[0].class{int{}},int{color})))
      end
      if lx=="æ–¹" then
        content.setBackgroundDrawable(activity.Resources.getDrawable(ripples).setColor(ColorStateList(int[0].class{int{}},int{color})))
      end
    end
  end,function(e)end)
end
--[[
æ³¢çº¹(id,lx,color)
idï¼šæ§ä»¶id,table
lxï¼šæ³¢çº¹ç±»å‹,åœ†æˆ–æ–¹,string
color æ³¢çº¹é¢œè‰²,number

å®‰å“5åŠä»¥ä¸Šå¯ç”¨ã€‚
è¯¥ä»£ç éœ€è¦MDä¸»é¢˜ã€‚
]]

--è°ƒç”¨ä¾‹å­
layout={
  LinearLayout;
  onClick=function()print("FALuaç¼–ç¨‹æ‰‹å†Œ")end;
  layout_width="-1";
  layout_height="-1";
  id="lay";
}
activity.setContentView(loadlayout(layout))
activity.setTheme(android.R.style.Theme_DeviceDefault_Light)
æ³¢çº¹({lay},"åœ†",0x21000000)

é«˜æ–¯æ¨¡ç³Š

lua
--é«˜æ–¯æ¨¡ç³Š
--é«˜æ–¯æ¨¡ç³Š

import "android.renderscript.Element"
import "android.renderscript.Allocation"
import "android.renderscript.RenderScript"
import "android.graphics.Bitmap"
import "android.renderscript.ScriptIntrinsicBlur"
import "android.graphics.Matrix"

function é«˜æ–¯æ¨¡ç³Š(id,tp,radius1,radius2)
  function blur( context, bitmap, blurRadius)
    renderScript = RenderScript.create(context);
    blurScript = ScriptIntrinsicBlur.create(renderScript, Element.U8_4(renderScript));
    inAllocation = Allocation.createFromBitmap(renderScript, bitmap);
    outputBitmap = bitmap;
    outAllocation = Allocation.createTyped(renderScript, inAllocation.getType());
    blurScript.setRadius(blurRadius);
    blurScript.setInput(inAllocation);
    blurScript.forEach(outAllocation);
    outAllocation.copyTo(outputBitmap);
    inAllocation.destroy();
    outAllocation.destroy();
    renderScript.destroy();
    blurScript.destroy();
    return outputBitmap;
  end
  function zoomBitmap(bitmap,scale)
    w = bitmap.getWidth();
    h = bitmap.getHeight();
    matrix = Matrix();
    matrix.postScale(scale, scale);
    bitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(bitmap, 0, 0, w, h, matrix, true);
    return bitmap;
  end
  function blurAndZoom(context,bitmap,blurRadius,scale)
    return zoomBitmap(blur(context,zoomBitmap(bitmap, 1 / scale), blurRadius), scale);
  end
  id.setImageBitmap(blurAndZoom(activity,tp,radius1,radius2))
end
--[[
é«˜æ–¯æ¨¡ç³Š(id,tp,radius1,radius2)
radius1 èŒƒå›´ï¼š1-25
radius2 èŒƒå›´ï¼š1-ï¼Ÿ(æ®å›¾ç‰‡è€Œå®šå¤ªå¤§æŠ¥é”™)
]]

--è°ƒç”¨ä¾‹å­
img=ImageView(activity)
activity.setContentView(img)

é«˜æ–¯æ¨¡ç³Š(img,loadbitmap("https://image.uisdc.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/uisdc-banner-20190614-2.jpg"),4,2)

--è·å–æ‚¬æµ®çª—æƒé™

import "android.net.Uri"
import "android.content.Intent"
import "android.provider.Settings"
function è·å–æ‚¬æµ®çª—æƒé™()
  intent = Intent(Settings.ACTION_MANAGE_OVERLAY_PERMISSION);
  intent.setData(Uri.parse("package:" .. activity.getPackageName()));
  activity.startActivityForResult(intent, 100);
end

--è°ƒç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹

åœ†å½¢å›¾ç‰‡

lua
--åœ†å½¢å›¾ç‰‡
function åœ†å½¢å›¾ç‰‡(bitmap)
  import "android.graphics.PorterDuffXfermode"
  import "android.graphics.Paint"
  import "android.graphics.RectF"
  import "android.graphics.Bitmap"
  import "android.graphics.PorterDuff$Mode"
  import "android.graphics.Rect"
  import "android.graphics.Canvas"
  import "android.util.Config"
  width = bitmap.getWidth()
  output = Bitmap.createBitmap(width, bitmap.getHeight(),Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888)
  canvas = Canvas(output);
  color = 0xff424242;
  paint = Paint()
  rect = Rect(0, 0, bitmap.getWidth(), bitmap.getHeight());
  rectF = RectF(rect);
  paint.setAntiAlias(true);
  canvas.drawARGB(0, 0, 0, 0);
  paint.setColor(color);
  canvas.drawRoundRect(rectF, width/2, bitmap.getHeight()/2, paint);
  paint.setXfermode(PorterDuffXfermode(Mode.SRC_IN));
  canvas.drawBitmap(bitmap, rect, rect, paint);
  return output;
end

--è°ƒç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
img=ImageView(activity)
activity.setContentView(img)
img.setImageBitmap(åœ†å½¢å›¾ç‰‡(loadbitmap("https://image.uisdc.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/uisdc-banner-20190614-2.jpg")))

function å…¨å±()
  window = activity.getWindow();
  window.getDecorView().setSystemUiVisibility(View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN|View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_FULLSCREEN);
  window.addFlags(WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_FULLSCREEN)
  xpcall(function()
    lp = window.getAttributes();
    lp.layoutInDisplayCutoutMode = WindowManager.LayoutParams.LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_CUTOUT_MODE_SHORT_EDGES;
    window.setAttributes(lp);
  end,
  function(e)
  end)
end
--ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥ä»£ç å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦éšè—ActionBar

è´å¡å°”æ›²çº¿

lua
import "com.androlua.LuaDrawable"
import "android.graphics.Path"
import "android.graphics.Paint"

function dp2px(dpValue)
  local scale = activity.getResources().getDisplayMetrics().scaledDensity
  return dpValue * scale + 0.5
end

function px2dp(pxValue)
  local scale = activity.getResources().getDisplayMetrics().scaledDensity
  return pxValue / scale + 0.5
end

function px2sp(pxValue)
  local scale = activity.getResources().getDisplayMetrics().scaledDensity;
  return pxValue / scale + 0.5
end

function sp2px(spValue)
  local scale = activity.getResources().getDisplayMetrics().scaledDensity
  return spValue * scale + 0.5
end

layout={
  RelativeLayout;
  layout_width="-1";
  background=backgroundc;
  layout_height="-1";
  {
    RelativeLayout,
    layout_width="-1",
    layout_height="-1",
    id="llb",
    gravity="bottom";
    {
      RelativeLayout,
      layout_width="fill",
      layout_height="56dp",
      clickable="true",
      id="ll",
      {
        LinearLayout;
        layout_width="-1";
        layout_height="-1";
        gravity="left|center";
        paddingLeft="8dp";
        paddingRight="8dp";
        {
          LinearLayout;
          layout_height="-1";
          layout_width="-2";
          layout_weight="1";
        };
        {
          TextView;
          layout_height="-1";
          layout_width="56dp";
          layout_marginRight="20dp";
          layout_marginLeft="8dp";
          --background=grayc;
        };
      };
    };
  },
  {
    LinearLayout;
    layout_width="-1";
    layout_height="-1";
    orientation="vertical";
    gravity="right|bottom";
    {
      CardView;
      layout_width="56dp",
      layout_height="56dp",
      radius="28dp";
      layout_margin="28dp";
      CardBackgroundColor="0xffffffff";
      elevation="6dp";
      alpha=1;
    };
  };

}

activity.setContentView(loadlayout(layout))

myLuaDrawable=LuaDrawable(function(mCanvas,mPaint,mDrawable)

  mPaint.setColor(0xffffffff)
  mPaint.setAntiAlias(true)
  mPaint.setStrokeWidth(20)
  mPaint.setStyle(Paint.Style.FILL)
  mPaint.setStrokeCap(Paint.Cap.ROUND)

  w=mDrawable.getBounds().right
  h=mDrawable.getBounds().bottom

  mPath=Path()

  mPath.moveTo(w, h);
  mPath.lineTo(0, h);
  mPath.lineTo(0, h-dp2px(56));

  mPath.lineTo(w-dp2px(56+16+16+8), h-dp2px(56));
  mPath.rQuadTo(dp2px(8), dp2px(0),dp2px(8+1), dp2px(8))
  mPath.rCubicTo(dp2px(8-1), dp2px(28+4),dp2px(56-1), dp2px(28+4),dp2px(56+8-2), dp2px(0))
  mPath.rQuadTo(dp2px(1), dp2px(-8),dp2px(8+1), dp2px(-8))
  mPath.rLineTo(w, 0);

  mCanvas.drawColor(0x00000000)
  mCanvas.drawPath(mPath, mPaint);

  mPath.close();
end)

ll.background=myLuaDrawable

myLuaDrawable=LuaDrawable(function(mCanvas,mPaint,mDrawable)

  mPaint.setColor(0x21000000)
  mPaint.setAntiAlias(true)
  mPaint.setStrokeWidth(dp2px(4))
  mPaint.setStyle(Paint.Style.FILL)
  mPaint.setStrokeCap(Paint.Cap.ROUND)

  w=mDrawable.getBounds().right
  h=mDrawable.getBounds().bottom

  mPath=Path()

  mPath.moveTo(w, h);
  mPath.lineTo(0, h);
  mPath.lineTo(0, h-dp2px(56));

  mPath.lineTo(w-dp2px(56+16+16+8), h-dp2px(56));
  mPath.rQuadTo(dp2px(8), dp2px(0),dp2px(8+1), dp2px(8))
  mPath.rCubicTo(dp2px(8-1), dp2px(28+4),dp2px(56-1), dp2px(28+4),dp2px(56+8-2), dp2px(0))
  mPath.rQuadTo(dp2px(1), dp2px(-8),dp2px(8+1), dp2px(-8))
  mPath.rLineTo(w, 0);

  mCanvas.drawColor(0x00000000)
  mPaint.setShadowLayer(dp2px(1), 0, dp2px(-1), 0x70FFFFFF);

  mCanvas.drawPath(mPath, mPaint);

  mPath.close();
end)

llb.background=myLuaDrawable

ä½¿ç”¨ç³»ç»Ÿ TTS æ’­æŠ¥è¯­éŸ³

--ä½¿ç”¨ç³»ç»ŸTTSæ’­æŠ¥è¯­éŸ³
import "android.speech.tts.*"

mTextSpeech = TextToSpeech(activity, TextToSpeech.OnInitListener{
  onInit=function(status)
    --å¦‚æœè£…è½½TTSæˆåŠŸ
    if (status == TextToSpeech.SUCCESS)
      result = mTextSpeech.setLanguage(Locale.CHINESE);
      --[[LANG_MISSING_DATA-->è¯­è¨€çš„æ•°æ®ä¸¢å¤±
          LANG_NOT_SUPPORTED-->è¯­è¨€ä¸æ”¯æŒ]]
      if (result == TextToSpeech.LANG_MISSING_DATA or result == TextToSpeech.LANG_NOT_SUPPORTED)
        --ä¸æ”¯æŒä¸­æ–‡
        print("æ‚¨çš„æ‰‹æœºä¸æ”¯æŒä¸­æ–‡è¯­éŸ³æ’­æŠ¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚");
        result = mTextSpeech.setLanguage(Locale.ENGLISH);
        if (result == TextToSpeech.LANG_MISSING_DATA or result == TextToSpeech.LANG_NOT_SUPPORTED)
          --ä¸æ”¯æŒä¸­æ–‡å’Œè‹±æ–‡
          print("æ‚¨çš„æ‰‹æœºä¸æ”¯æŒè¯­éŸ³æ’­æŠ¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚");
         else
          --ä¸æ”¯æŒä¸­æ–‡ä½†æ”¯æŒè‹±æ–‡
          --è¯­è°ƒ,1.0é»˜è®¤
          mTextSpeech.setPitch(1);
          --è¯­é€Ÿ,1.0é»˜è®¤
          mTextSpeech.setSpeechRate(1);
          mTextSpeech.speak("hello,MLua Manual.Hello,World!", TextToSpeech.QUEUE_FLUSH, nil);
        end
       else
        --æ”¯æŒä¸­æ–‡
        --è¯­è°ƒ,1.0é»˜è®¤
        mTextSpeech.setPitch(1);
        --è¯­é€Ÿ,1.0é»˜è®¤
        mTextSpeech.setSpeechRate(1);
        mTextSpeech.speak("ä½ å¥½ï¼ŒMLuaæ‰‹å†Œã€‚ä½ å¥½ï¼Œä¸–ç•Œï¼", TextToSpeech.QUEUE_FLUSH, nil);
      end
    end
  end
});

è·å–æ§ä»¶å›¾ç‰‡

lua
--è·å–æ§ä»¶å›¾ç‰‡
import "android.graphics.Bitmap"

function è·å–æ§ä»¶å›¾ç‰‡(view)
  local linearParams = view.getLayoutParams()
  local vw=linearParams.width
  local linearParams = view.getLayoutParams()
  local vh=linearParams.height
  view.setDrawingCacheEnabled(true)
  view.layout(0,0,vw,vh)
  return Bitmap.createBitmap(view.getDrawingCache())
end

--è°ƒç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
--å¸ƒå±€
layout={
  LinearLayout,
  layout_width="-1",
  layout_height="-1",
  orientation="vertical";
  {
    TextView,
    textSize="14sp";
    layout_width="56dp",
    layout_height="42dp",
    text="TextView1",
    textColor="#FFFFFFFF";
    background="#212121",
    id="tv";
  },
  {
    ImageView,
    layout_width="-1",
    layout_height="-1",
    id="img";
  },
}
--è®¾ç½®å¸ƒå±€

--è·å–tvçš„å›¾ç‰‡è®¾ç½®ç»™img

è·å–ä¸è®¾ç½® Cookie

lua
import "android.webkit.CookieSyncManager"
import "android.webkit.CookieManager"

function è®¾ç½®Cookie(context,url,content)
  CookieSyncManager.createInstance(context)
  local cookieManager = CookieManager.getInstance()
  cookieManager.setAcceptCookie(true)
  cookieManager.removeSessionCookie()
  cookieManager.removeAllCookie()
  cookieManager.setCookie(url, content)
  CookieSyncManager.getInstance().sync()
end

function è·å–Cookie(url)
  local cookieManager = CookieManager.getInstance();
  return cookieManager.getCookie(url);
end

--ç¤ºä¾‹
--è·å–https://www.baidu.comçš„cookieå¹¶æ‰“å°
print(è·å–Cookie("https://www.baidu.com"))
--è®¾ç½®https://www.baidu.comçš„cookieä¸ºThis is cookie
è®¾ç½®Cookie(activity,"https://www.baidu.com","This is cookie")
--è·å–https://www.baidu.comçš„cookieå¹¶æ‰“å°
print(è·å–Cookie("https://www.baidu.com"))

è‡ªå®šä¹‰ Callback

lua
--è‡ªå®šä¹‰Callback
function SentText(text,callback)
  xpcall(function()
    Toast.makeText(activity,text,Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
    callback(true)
  end,function()
    callback(false)
  end)
end

SentText("emmmm",function(is)
  print(is)
end)

æ­£åˆ™å–æ–‡ä»¶å

function å–æ–‡ä»¶å(path)
  return path:match(".+/(.+)$")
end

function å–æ–‡ä»¶åæ— åç¼€(path)
  return path:match(".+/(.+)%..+$")
end

print(å–æ–‡ä»¶å("/com/mukapp/top/muk.lua"))

è®¾ç½®æ§ä»¶å­—ä½“

import "android.graphics.Typeface"
import "java.io.File"

--å¸ƒå±€è¡¨ä¸­è°ƒç”¨
function å­—ä½“(t)
  return Typeface.createFromFile(File(activity.getLuaDir().."/res/"..t..".ttf"))
end

--æ —å­:Typeface=å­—ä½“("Product")

--ä»£ç ä¸­è°ƒç”¨
function å­—ä½“è®¾ç½®(id,t)
  id.setTypeface(Typeface.createFromFile(File(activity.getLuaDir().."/res/"..t..".ttf")))
end

--æ —å­:å­—ä½“è®¾ç½®(tv,"Product")

--å­—ä½“éœ€è¦æ”¾åœ¨resæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹

è·å–æ§ä»¶é«˜åº¦ã€‹ã€‹ ã€Šã€Š --è·å–æ§ä»¶é«˜åº¦ --å¯¼å…¥åŒ… import "android.content.Context"

function getwh(view) view.measure(View.MeasureSpec.makeMeasureSpec(0,View.MeasureSpec.UNSPECIFIED),View.MeasureSpec.makeMeasureSpec(0,View.MeasureSpec.UNSPECIFIED)); height =view.getMeasuredHeight(); width =view.getMeasuredWidth(); return width,height end

--è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³• print(getwh(æ§ä»¶ ID))

ã€‘ã€‘ ã€Šã€ŠåŒ¹é…æ±‰å­—

lua
function filter_spec_chars(s)
  local ss = {}
  for k = 1, #s do
    local c = string.byte(s,k)
    if not c then break end
    if (c>=48 and c<=57) or (c>= 65 and c<=90) or (c>=97 and c<=122) then
      if not string.char(c):find("%w") then
        table.insert(ss, string.char(c))
      end
    elseif c>=228 and c<=233 then
      local c1 = string.byte(s,k+1)
      local c2 = string.byte(s,k+2)
      if c1 and c2 then
        local a1,a2,a3,a4 = 128,191,128,191
        if c == 228 then a1 = 184
        elseif c == 233 then a2,a4 = 190,c1 ~= 190 and 191 or 165
        end
        if c1>=a1 and c1<=a2 and c2>=a3 and c2<=a4 then
          k = k + 2
          table.insert(ss, string.char(c,c1,c2))
        end
      end
    end
  end
  return table.concat(ss)
end
print(filter_spec_chars("A1B2æ±‰C3D4å­—E5F6,,,"))

  --function

  --boolean
  print(type(nil))
  --nil
  print(type(type(X)))
  --string

é€’å½’æœç´¢æ–‡ä»¶

lua
require "import"

function find(catalog,name)
  local n=0
  local t=os.clock()
  local ret={}
  require "import"
  import "java.io.File"
  import "java.lang.String"
  function FindFile(catalog,name)
    local name=tostring(name)
    local ls=catalog.listFiles() or File{}
    for æ¬¡æ•°=0,#ls-1 do
      --local ç›®å½•=tostring(ls[æ¬¡æ•°])
      local f=ls[æ¬¡æ•°]
      if f.isDirectory() then--å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹åˆ™ç»§ç»­åŒ¹é…
        FindFile(f,name)
      else--å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶åˆ™
        n=n+1
        if n%1000==0 then
          --print(n,os.clock()-t)
        end
        local nm=f.Name
        if string.find(nm,name) then
          --thread(insert,ç›®å½•)
          table.insert(ret,nm)
          print(nm)
        end
      end
      luajava.clear(f)
    end
  end
  FindFile(catalog,name)
  print("ok",n,#ret)
end

import "java.io.File"

catalog=File("sdcard/")
name=".j?pn?g"
--task(find,catalog,name,print)
thread(find,catalog,name)

è·å– LiveView å‚ç›´åæ ‡

lua
function getScrollY()
  c = ls.getChildAt(0);
  local firstVisiblePosition = ls.getFirstVisiblePosition();
  local top = c.getTop();
  return -top + firstVisiblePosition * c.getHeight() ;
end

è·å–è§†å›¾æ–‡æœ¬

lua
function GetAllText(view)
textTable={}
function GetText(Parent)
local number=Parent.getChildCount()
for i=0,number do
local view=Parent.getChildAt(i)
if pcall(function()view.addView(TextView(activity))end) then
GetText(view)
elseif pcall(function()view.getText()end) then
table.insert(textTable,tostring(view.Text))
end
end
end
GetText(view)
return textTable
end

print(table.unpack(GetAllText(Parent)))

function GetAppInfo(åŒ…å)
  import "android.content.pm.PackageManager"
  local pm = activity.getPackageManager();
  local å›¾æ ‡ = pm.getApplicationInfo(tostring(åŒ…å),0)
  local å›¾æ ‡ = å›¾æ ‡.loadIcon(pm);
  local pkg = activity.getPackageManager().getPackageInfo(åŒ…å, 0);
  local åº”ç”¨åç§° = pkg.applicationInfo.loadLabel(activity.getPackageManager())
  local ç‰ˆæœ¬å· = activity.getPackageManager().getPackageInfo(åŒ…å, 0).versionName
  local æœ€åæ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ = activity.getPackageManager().getPackageInfo(åŒ…å, 0).lastUpdateTime
  local cal = Calendar.getInstance();
  cal.setTimeInMillis(æœ€åæ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´);
  local æœ€åæ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ = cal.getTime().toLocaleString()
  return åŒ…å,ç‰ˆæœ¬å·,æœ€åæ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´,å›¾æ ‡,åº”ç”¨åç§°
end

zipfile = "/sdcard/å‹ç¼©åŒ….zip"--å‹ç¼©æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„å’Œæ–‡ä»¶å
sdpath = "/sdcard/æ–‡ä»¶.lua"--è§£å‹åè·¯å¾„å’Œæ–‡ä»¶å
zipfilepath = "å†…å®¹.lua"--éœ€è¦è§£å‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶å

function unzip(zippath , outfilepath , filename)

  local time=os.clock()
  task(function(zippath,outfilepath,filename)
    require "import"
    import "java.util.zip.*"
    import "java.io.*"
    local file = File(zippath)
    local outFile = File(outfilepath)
    local zipFile = ZipFile(file)
    local entry = zipFile.getEntry(filename)
    local input = zipFile.getInputStream(entry)
    local output = FileOutputStream(outFile)
    local byte=byte[entry.getSize()]
    local temp=input.read(byte)
    while temp ~= -1 do
      output.write(byte)
      temp=input.read(byte)
    end
    input.close()
    output.close()
  end,zippath,outfilepath,filename,
  function()
    print("è§£å‹å®Œæˆï¼Œè€—æ—¶ "..os.clock()-time.." s")
  end)

end

unzip(zipfile,sdpath,zipfilepath)

è®¾ç½®ç¼©æ”¾(v,1,0.95,250)
else

function è®¾ç½®ç¼©æ”¾(view,startscale,endscale,time)
local animatorSetsuofang = AnimatorSet()
local scaleX=ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(view,"scaleX",{startscale,endscale})
local scaleY=ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(view,"scaleY",{startscale,endscale})
animatorSetsuofang.setDuration(time)
animatorSetsuofang.setInterpolator(DecelerateInterpolator())
animatorSetsuofang.play(scaleX).with(scaleY);
animatorSetsuofang.start()
end

è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»–ç¨‹åºæ‰“å¼€

lua
function OpenFile(path)
import "android.webkit.MimeTypeMap"
import "android.content.Intent"
import "android.net.Uri"
import "java.io.File"
FileName=tostring(File(path).Name)
ExtensionName=FileName:match("%.(.+)")
Mime=MimeTypeMap.getSingleton().getMimeTypeFromExtension(ExtensionName)
if Mime then
intent = Intent();
intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
intent.setAction(Intent.ACTION_VIEW);
intent.setDataAndType(Uri.fromFile(File(path)), Mime);
activity.startActivity(intent);
else
Toastc("æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥æ‰“å¼€æ­¤æ–‡ä»¶çš„ç¨‹åº")
end
end
OpenFile("/storage/emulated/0/Download/è¿™æ˜¯ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹.jpg")

function åˆ†äº«æ–‡ä»¶(æ ‡é¢˜,è·¯å¾„)

import "android.content.Intent"
import "android.net.Uri"
import "java.io.File"
FileName=tostring(File(è·¯å¾„).Name)
ExtensionName=FileName:match("%.(.+)")
Mime=MimeTypeMap.getSingleton().getMimeTypeFromExtension(ExtensionName)
intent=Intent()
intent.setAction(Intent.ACTION_SEND)
intent.setType(Mime)
file=File(è·¯å¾„)
uri=Uri.fromFile(file)
intent.putExtra(Intent.EXTRA_STREAM,uri)
intent.setFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK)
activity.startActivity(Intent.createChooser(intent,æ ‡é¢˜))
end

end,

onPageStarted=function(view,url,favicon)
--æ”¶åˆ°æ–°æ ‡é¢˜
end,

onPageFinished=function(view,url)
--ç½‘é¡µåŠ è½½å®Œæ¯•
end
}
